duties_responsibilities.duty: Conducting intakes, behavior intervention plans, and skill acquisition programs
Supervising RBT’s and providing ongoing training to them
Analyzing data, implementing/adjusting interventions, and submitting monthly progress reports
Providing training to stakeholders as needed and creating plans for fading RBT support, generalization, and maintenance
Collaborating with peers, attending group meetings, and providing feedback and ideas for better client service
Creating behavior intervention plans and conducting FBA’s, FA’s, indirect assessments, and criterion-based assessments

education_certification.credential: Board Certification in Applied Behavior Analysis (BCBA)
8-hour supervision training required by the BACB
2 years experience working with children with developmental disabilities
